name: Nitrogen Network
mission: Equip urban churches and communities to holistically flourish.
vision: Transform underserved neighborhoods by empowering leaders, strengthening well-being, and closing the technology gap.
funding_priorities: AI, The Church, and Urban Communities

Pastors Thriving Together.description: A six-month leadership journey pairing urban pastors with experienced mentors in Michigan, Charlotte, and Atlanta.
components: Training in resource management, fundraising, and community collaboration
Pastors Thriving Together.outcome: Sustainable, multiplying ministries led by connected, well-equipped pastors.

Mental Health and the Church.description: In partnership with Restored Counseling Group, training church leaders to recognize, refer, and support mental health needs.
Mental Health and the Church.outcome: Churches serve as trusted, culturally sensitive hubs for compassionate community care.

AI, The Church, and Urban Communities.description: Hands-on AI skills training to close the digital divide and spur local innovation.

Youth.focus: Interactive AI foundations, game/app development, team-based community projects.
Youth.outcome: Designed an AI-integrated app addressing a local challenge.

Community Adults.focus: Everyday AI use (planning, budgeting, communication), small-business/nonprofit app builds.
Community Adults.outcome: Personal AI action plan and a functional community-oriented AI app.

Business Leaders.focus: Identify AI use cases, build AI fluency, apply the MOST framework to strategy, co-develop a business solution app.
Business Leaders.outcome: Working AI tool or roadmap enhancing organizational operations.

Urban Church Planting.description: A five-step process to launch and sustain new urban congregations.
Urban Church Planting.outcome: 35 churches launched in Michigan; 45 more planned by 2028 in Atlanta and Charlotte.

core_values: Holistic Care: Integrating spiritual support, mental health resources, and practical technology.
Human-Centered: Designing culturally sensitive, accessible programs.
Ethical AI: Keeping the human in the loop and promoting responsible innovation.
Equity & Inclusion: Building local capacity to ensure lasting community transformation.
strategic_goals: Pastors Thriving Together: 100 pastors trained by 2026.
Mental Health & the Church: Launch in 20 new congregations yearly.
AI in the City: Train 500 participants annually across all three audiences.
Urban Church Planting: Plant 10 new churches per year through local partnerships.
